actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for the payment of unemployment compensation to individuals residing in Guam on the basis of Federal civilian service or service in the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Provides for the payment of unemployment compensation to individuals residing in Guam on the basis of service as a Federal employee, provided that such employee is not entitled to unemployment compensation based upon other service and wages.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the payment of unemployment compensation to individuals residing in Guam on the basis of Federal civilian service or service in the Armed Forces.
